B1483.description: Ayesha never spoke of home, yet she always recalled the song sung by the chieftain's wife at her parents' funeral.

B1494.name: Ripening Fruits
B1494.description: When the sun finally peeks through the clouds, Glenna dashes outside, twirling joyfully beneath the grapevines.

B1495.name: Vine of Dreams
B1495.description: When she wakes in her bedroom, there are no squirrels around. Outside, someone is yelling, 'The sun's out!'

B1497.name: Chronicle of Love
B1497.description: Whenever she senses a nightmare, the staff in Anno's hand glows, guiding her flock toward the right path in dreams.

B1499.name: Moment of Harvest
B1499.description: The autumn breeze sweeps through the farm, carrying the scent of wheat into Rinya's dreams. It's finally harvested.

B1500.name: Power of Dreams
B1500.description: One must pass trials to become a princess, so Youell packed up and embarked on her adventure in the forest.

B1501.name: Wishing Glimmer
B1501.description: Pumpkins were rolled out in carts and filled every yard. Pepena came home to see her family carving pumpkins.

B1503.name: Past Glimpse
B1503.description: The old folks hand their letters to Olitha and wish to see her again with news from their family and friends.

B1504.name: Vestigial Past
B1504.description: She recalled the town tales her grandma told her, but the letters she wrote could never reach her grandma again.

B1508.name: Lunar Cruise
B1508.description: Many witches were reluctant to admit it, but they knew Morino was far more talented than them.

B1516.name: Zephyr Boon
B1516.description: Perron arrives in the morning breeze with a beautiful box. Inside is a letter from Yvette and their gift for Nikki.

B1531.name: Sylvan Grace
B1531.description: Blooms in winter were blessed by the Goddess, but Mornian never had time to offer one herself.

B1535.name: Dreaming Cirrus
B1535.description: She worked as an assistant in a dance studio and often practiced in the empty room till late at night after work.

B1536.name: Cosmic Infinity
B1536.description: But even Goddess Vianna would wish for company on the secluded peaks. Only the frosty wind spoke of her loneliness.
